text: Leon Richardson (born 12 February 1957) is an Antiguan former cyclist. He competed in the sprint and 1000m time trial events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Antigua and Barbuda male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Antigua and Barbuda Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Leon Richardson
